elements.Text: When you think about spending less time with your family

elements.name: Spending Time With Family_Family & Home Life_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
buttons: You worry that you will lose them from your life.
You also think about how much you enjoy seeing them, and believe that you will always be close to them.
elements.correct_value: You worry that you will lose them from your life.
